content.text: Covalent is the design system for Teradata products. It serves a single purpose of providing a cohesive language for its primary audiencesâ€”the designers, content designers, and developers.

They are the masterminds who shape the product experiences where their expertise directly impacts the quality of the outcome. To empower them with a cohesive language that guides them in building simple and intuitive experiences, here's how we apply the design principles in the making of the design system.
